description: This trap indicates a module is offline.
An index into the Atlas Module Information Table.
This variable corresponds to the module's slot number.
variables.name: ADTRAN-ATLAS-MODULE-MIB::adATLASModuleInfoIndex

description: A bit-encoded variable that indicates the front panel
status of the module. It is encoded as follows:
Note: Multiple bits may be set concurrently, based on the
variables.name: ADTRAN-ATLAS-MODULE-MIB::adATLASModuleInfoFPStatus

description: A bit-encoded variable that gives the overall front panel
status of the Atlas product. It is encoded as follows:
Note: Multiple bits may be set concurrently, based on the
current state of the modules contained within the Atlas
variables.name: ADTRAN-ATLAS-UNIT-MIB::adATLASUnitFPStatus

description: This trap indicates an endpoint has detected a failure
and is attempting a backup call.
